TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ConvertEventHandler(object sender, ConvertEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ConvertEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ConvertEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ConvertEventArgs)
public delegate void ConvertEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ConvertEventArgs ^ e);
type ConvertEventHandler = delegate of obj * ConvertEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 的 和 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the and events of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼The following code 範例會建立，新增委派兩者和事件，並將至的透過控制屬性。example creates a , adds a delegate to both the and events, and adds the to the of a control through the property. `DecimalToCurrency`事件委派，加入至事件，會將繫結的值格式化 (類型) 做為貨幣使用方法。The `DecimalToCurrency` event delegate, added to the event, formats the bound value (a type) as currency using the method. `CurrencyToDecimal`事件委派，加入至事件，將控制項所顯示的值轉換回型別。The `CurrencyToDecimal` event delegate, added to the event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the type. [!code-cpp[Classic ConvertEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventHandler Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ConvertEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventHandler Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ConvertEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventHandler Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
